steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d97eo","text":"Thaw frozen competent cells    until just thawed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7b63v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B6BFC2308BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"co6n9","text":"Gently mix the thawed competent cells (Rosetta 2 (pLysS)) by flicking the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f81ak","text":"Transfer 100 Î¼l competent cells to a chilled culture tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"brbfh","text":"Add 1 ng DNA plasmid to the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"te5h","text":"Immediately return the tubes    for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f3ugr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C4D346308BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"C81A33D08BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f53g5","text":"Heat-shock the cells at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"47dco","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CF8E50608BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"42","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":45,"guid":"D3080DD08BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vs0m","text":"Immediately place the tube   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1hgg9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DA0B40208BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"42","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"D7C791B08BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2im3","text":"Add 900 Î¼l of cold SOC medium to the tube and incubate for   at   with shaking   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"adkct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"DF8736308BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E19814D08BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8FD580608BB811ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"175","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6pog","text":"Pellet the cells by centrifugation at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"av08i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"12000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EDFE0FE08BB311ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5bc9","text":"Remove the supernatant and plate onto agar plates containing 50 Î¼g/ml kanamycin and 34 Î¼g/ml chloramphenicol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95fq3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eaf9u","text":"Incubate the plate at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ejmr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"062932208BB411ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"084953008BB411ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gh4s","text":"Inoculate one colony into 50 ml LB containing 50 Î¼g/ml kanamycin and 34 Î¼g/ml chloramphenicol. Incubate   on shaker   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":104,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":116,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":121,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7abl5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"DFFCCCA08BB911ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"59AC5E208BB611ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"175","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"31E4B8D08BB411ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7el0","text":"Transfer the overnight culture into 1 liter LB containing 50 Î¼g/ml kanamycin and 34 Î¼g/ml chloramphenicol to reach OD600 of 0.1.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":117,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fh64o","text":"Incubate at   with shaking   to reach OD600 of 0.6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":40,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5aomo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4081B8208BB411ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"61F88B308BB611ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"175","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7p9r2","text":"Add IPTG to a final concentration of 0.5 mM and grow for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5hmpo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"8EB763008BB411ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9062F0208BB411ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1p5l","text":"Harvest the cells by centrifugation at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c8aht","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"5000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A3B27B008BB411ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3c8f9","text":"Re-suspend the cell pellet with PBS, spin down and snap-freeze in liquid nitrogen for later purification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cpt5v","text":"Assemble a table column and fill the column with Ni-NTA resin to create a bed volume of 5 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"86lur","text":"Wash the column with 100 ml H2O.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e2jm0","text":"Equilibrate the column with 5 CVs Ni-NTA loading buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqui8","text":"Thaw the cell pellet   until just thawed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b0v2o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2DA4A8B08BB511ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":165}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"de8dc","text":"Re-suspend cell pellet (from 1 liter) with 35 mL lysis buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dqe38","text":"Sonicate for    (20 seconds on/off) and clarify by centrifugation at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"840pe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"47DBA0808BB511ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"25000","duration":1800,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"56533D808BB511ECB6FD8FFE0D9625AE","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a4s0g","text":"Filter the supernatant through a 0.22 Î¼m syringe filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fiuvf","text":"Wash the resin with 100 ml Ni-NTA loading buffer followed by 50 ml Ni-NTA wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7cj41","text":"Elute the protein in batch six times with 5 ml Ni-NTA elution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"36cmu","text":"Analyze fractions by 7.5% SDS-PAGE and coomassie staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctrfa","text":"Collect relevant elution fractions, dilute into a low-salt buffer and filter through a 0.22 Î¼m syringe filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bld4l","text":"Load onto a 1 ml HiTrap heparin HP column pre-equilibrated in low-salt buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1l7o","text":"Elute the protein with a linear gradient of 100 mM to 1M KCl over 40 CVs. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6a50p","text":"Analyze fractions by 7.5% SDS-PAGE and coomassie staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnsv2","text":"Pool peak elution fractions and concentrate using a Spin-X UF 20 50 kDa MWCO to 8 mg/ml (determine protein concentration by UV at wavelength of 280 nm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ibaf","text":"Make 3 Âµl protein sample aliquot and snap-freeze in liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"85q1q","text":"Store protein at -80 Â°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3s82b","text":"Pour the supernatant into the table column in a single, continuous motion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
